description:
LEARN FROM SOMEONE WHO IS DOING WHAT THEY ARE TEACHING! This is not theory, everything you will learn in this course I have done and continue to do so you can be assured it works.

In this course I am going to show you how to take your new private label product and launch it successfully on Amazon. This is what I call the “Amazon Product Launch Formula”.

Building on my course “Home Business - Make $40,000 a Month Selling On Amazon FBA” this course will help you to take your new private label product and launch it successfully on the Amazon marketplace.

Most sellers fail when selling on Amazon as they have no idea how to get their product to sell. In this course you will learn everything you need to know to take your product from just being listed on Amazon to becoming a bestseller in your niche.

You will learn:

  • The Amazon product launch formula with step by step instructions
  • Critical tools needed to make your Amazon product launch a success
  • How to drive your product to page ONE of Amazon’s search results
  • How to use press releases to help drive sales
  • How to properly plan your product launch
  • How to use FaceBook to drive customers to your product


About this course:

  • Regular free surprise bonuses to increase your income even more!
  • Complete Step By Step Blueprint With Everything Shown On The Screen!
  • Full, free lifetime access
  • All future extra lectures and upgrades are always included for free
  • Unconditional Udemy 30 day money-back guarantee - that's my personal promise of your success!


As with all my courses:

  • You have unlimited lifetime access at no extra costs, ever
  • All future additional lectures, bonuses, etc in this course are always free
  • There's an unconditional, never any questions asked full 30 day money-back-in-full guarantee


My help is always available to you if you get stuck or have a question.
title: Amazon Business - Formula To Launch A Product On Amazon FBA
